title: MBMBaM 538: Shoegaze Mopeytones
description:
This week’s episode is chock-full of breaking news alerts, most of which send us spiraling hornily into homemade Home Improvement erotic fiction. I swear to God I’ve written this exact description for an episode before. What is wrong with us?

Suggested talking points: Tim on Tim, Fog Machine Hacks, Time on the Clock, Fiction Family, KFC Slater, Psychic Doughnuts  

Ways to support Black Lives Matter and find anti-racism resources: https://linktr.ee/blacklivesmatter
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
